original_title: A funeral : a strategy of difference and repetition
overview: Philosophical road-movie about the deranged paedophile Friedrich Nietzsche and his murder obsessed self-mutilating sister Elisabeth.  Publisher: 	[South Africa] : African Noise Foundation, [2012?]  Edition/Format:  DVD video : English  Notes: 	Originally filmed in 1997-1991, edited in 2002.  Credits: 	Editor, Thempeka Laduma, original music Ramon dos Santos.  Cast: 	Djeff Babcock, Andrea Spook, Cassandra Aki.  Description: 	1 DVD (33 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in.  Details: 	DVD; Dolby digital.  Responsibility: 	written and directed by Aryan Kaganof.
title: A funeral : a strategy of difference and repetition
